metadata.name: Beyond The Borders - #001
metadata.description:
Iâ€™ve always loved film, but there are certain moments that always caught my attention more than others. Seeing a location for the first time, you experience the lighting, the mood, the feel of the landscape. The location / landscape is as much a character in the narrative as the hero or villain. With this collection I invite you to explore beyond the borders of your PFP and discover the environment that surrounds them. This single cinematic frame will be a snapshot of as they find themselves on the precipice of something larger than themselves.


What do you get?  
- Single Cinematic Frame  
- World Building with the Lore Team  
- Preview image for Before / After Comparisons


Turn around time : 21 days


Here are a few things to keep in mind  
- After you win the auction we start to understand the world of your NFT.  
- Once the world synopsis is created & approved no more big changes.  
- 2x minor revisions.
